Egg McMuffin
■This shows a
correctly made
Egg McMuffin.

Procedure
■Prepare the wrapper first. Put
the heel of the English muffin
on it.

Procedure
■Put a slice
of cheese on
top.

Procedure
■Now put on
a round egg
from the UHC.

Procedure
■Next put on
a piece of
Canadian bacon
from the UHC.

Procedure
■Wrap the finished product in
the wrapper and slide it down
the HLZ.
